attributes.action: Do not enforce doctor contract changes, it risks patient and professional safety
attributes.background: We feel the doctor contract changes that are due to be imposed without negotiation with doctors will increase the risk of harm to both patients and professionals. The BMA can't negotiate with the government on the issue as if they entered talks they would have to accept the flawed DDRB Report.

rejection.details:
I'm sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/108782

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
